Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits the sale of merchandise with symbols of hate
Summary: Prohibits the sale of merchandise with symbols of hate; defines "symbols of hate" to include, but not be limited to, symbols of white supremacy, neo-Nazi ideology or the Battle Flag of the Confederate.
LawCode: Add ยง391-bb, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of merchandise with symbols of hate
